subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Ty Lawson scored 25 points, and the Denver Nuggets beat the Oklahoma City Thunder, 114-104, to win a 13th straight game for the first time since joining the N.B.A.
snippet: Ty Lawson scored 25 points, and the Denver Nuggets beat the Oklahoma City Thunder, 114-104, to win a 13th straight game for the first time since joining the N.B.A.
